articles.title: What are those tiny, flaky balls that sometimes form on the skin when you're putting on skincare products? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Do you often get annoying grainy balls forming on top of your skincare and makeup, causing your precious products to roll off your face? It's called pilling and we have anti-pilling tips.
articles.content:
If you find your skincare often pilling, perhaps youre using more products than your skin can handle, and using too much of each type of skincare.
